1.title: Wild Friday Night

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

1.plot: When dealing with the turmoil of close living quarters, tensions can be high when roommates have a different view of their Friday night.

2.title: Tupperware Tupper Where

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

2.plot: How do you deal with missing personal items, especially when you're still trying to get to know and understand your new and different roommate.

3.title: The Breakup

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

3.plot: When living in tight quarters, your roommates problems become your problems. What happens when unwanted life changing events create rifts in Ryan's life?

4.title: Missing Rent

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

4.plot: Money is hard, and you have you have to share an apartment to make ends meet. Tensions can run high when someone doesn't come up with their end of the bargain.

5.title: Dirty Laundry

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

5.plot: Having to deal with someone new and different is hard enough,m but what happens with you have to deal with their dirty laundry.

6.title: Difference of Opinion

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: Life between friends and family is hard enough, but how do you deal with different opinions on important subject matter with roommates you barely know?

7.title: Picky Eaters

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

7.plot: In close quarters you have to share everything, in close quarters and tough times, you sometime have to share food as well. How do you come to an understand of life's nourishment?

8.title: Power Struggle

episode of.title: Doodly Do Salt Lake City (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

8.plot: When spending a lot of time with a new roommate, it's important to figure out where each person stands. The internal power struggle can be a bitter battle.
